Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Normal Blue Line Service Restored
ShortDescription: Service on the Blue Line has resumed, trains are running normally following earlier police activity at Forest Park terminal. Service resuming allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Normal service on the Blue Line has resumed and trains are running normally following earlier police activity at Forest Park terminal.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
